channel.title: [Written From Scratch]Quantantalious - One Name, One Legend
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img810.imageshack.us/img810/6408/quant.jpg[/img][/center] [hr] [size=14pt][b]Introduction:[/b][/size] Hello, this is Quantantalious, AtomicInt_ and I decided to gather a team together to beat all these sources everyone uses today. Now, we've [mainly me] decided to call the server 'Quantantalious,' don't ask how I came up with that name, don't worry about it. Anyway, this source is going to be noob-friendly to let all the members anywhere use this source, like Project Insanity, just better - far better. We'll be working extremely hard in achieving all the goals we decide to set for ourselves. Put us in your signature and support us!
Our main goal is to just make a noob-friendly source that will surpass users from using the shitty sources like Project Insanity, winterLove, DeltaScape, etc. We're tired of seeing all these people using Project Insanity, mainly, so we came up with the idea to develop a better source than all of these sources to have users use this one.
This source will have many of features, plenty of minigames, all the skills, better combat, faster switching, etc. We'll list all of the features in the update log, this project will take a long time and we hope that you will [again] support us and put us in your signature! We'll be putting quite a bit of effort in this source and will take quite a bit of time to release this, as we're going to be hosting it before the release. [hr] [size=14pt][b]Other Websites:[/b][/size] [url=http://twitter.com/#!/Quantantalious][img]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/3659/twitterfavicon.png[/img]Follow us on Twitter[/url] [size=8pt]Will be adding more soon...[/size] [hr] [size=14pt][b]The Team:[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Uncalled[/li] [li]AtomicInt_[/li] [li]imsuperman05[/li][/ul]
[hr] [code=UpdateLog] -Shared the files [time to get to work] -Added NIO networking -Got a 317 client loading 319 -Added basic user info -Added user parsing [/code] [hr] [img]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/6065/javaquantantalioussrcor.png[/img] [hr] [size=14pt][b]Support Banners:[/b][/size] [size=6pt]There'll be more.[/size] Put it in your signature on other sites, like Rune-Serber and RuneLotus. [code][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,529380.0.html][img]http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/5266/supportgq.jpg[/img][/url][/code] [img]http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/5266/supportgq.jpg[/img]

item.title: [Written From Scratch]Quantantalious - One Name, One Legend
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

baddy351:

I say good luck… Even though I know this won’t get anywhere. Like it or not you guys were not ready to start the framework -For 1 a framework is a shit-ton of work, and you guys be lazy… and 2 - takes more knowledge than the normal-. Lmao… Glad I didn’t help superman, he wanted me to do logging in XD now i know why. All I am saying is stop quitting projects. Finish this ryley, to the point (Even using the base server) that it can handle NPCs and I will pitch in (Give you guys some things…). As always, goodluck. I hope this gets far.

It only has login and player saving.

Read full topic

programming, irc, cars

I PM’ed Uncalled to update the thread with stuff I gave him but I forgot he was muted… -.-

But, I’ve come to the decision to use a base server. Not one in the downloads section. We will be using Nital by Thomas Nappo, Blake Beaupain, Steven Galarza ('Mystic flow)

item.title: [Written From Scratch]Quantantalious - One Name, One Legend
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote="`SJ_, post:164, topic:426684"][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=529380.msg3870593#msg3870593 date=1325309168]

Just a bit of feed back. Ryley let me look at the server.

First off, your packaging sucks.
Your conventions are absolutely horrendous, you never name a package with an uppercase.
The packets class is completely useless

Why are you guys starting on NPC’s if you haven’t even gotten past login yet, the list goes on.

That’s all I really want to say. Needs a lot of work yet, but that should help you guys get on the right path. Oh, I would also look into structure. Also, I would highly recommend looking at this if you guys ever get lost at some point
http://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=RSWiki:Community_portal#RS2_.23317

Good luck.

The uppercase in the packaging, I changed it to lower-case. I think Uncalled did that, I’m not sure, it wasn’t like that before. We started on the npcs, stated this multiple times I think, because none of us have tried login. Since I have nothing to do, I’m going to attempt it.

&& how is the packets class useless?

Btw, Uncalled send me a client to use, or put it in dropbox so that I can test if I ever get somewhere with login.

because it’s completely empty.

no it contains the id and channel instance duhh. It’s needed later though… but never mind that
[/quote]

what about the rest of the packets.[/quote]
omg packets arent the problem now -.-, it’s just one class that we will need LATER, not now, or prob never… prob will be deleted. but atm we need to work on login and decoding…

Read full topic
item.source: [Written From Scratch]Quantantalious - One Name, One Legend

I know the protocol is the same…
